title: Havre de Paix
description: Havre de Paix is a platform for renting houses, apartments, and rooms for peaceful and enjoyable stays. Users can search for accommodations based on their preferences and book directly online.

title: Docto-Rdv
description: Docto-Rdv is an appointment booking website for healthcare practitioners. This platform allows users to search for doctors, view their availability, and book appointments online easily and quickly.

title: Les Trésors Cachés de la Maison
description: Les Trésors Cachés de la Maison is a blog dedicated to the art of homemade living, highlighting natural remedies and healthy practices for a balanced life.

title: Kasa
description: Kasa is a platform for renting apartments directly from owners. As a freelance front-end developer, my role was to create a modern and intuitive user interface based on the design mockups provided by the design team.
